file_content.text: The stage is set for my daughter's ruin. Strike her down, and this empire will be yours to command.
For my first order of business, I think I'll have the Eternal Fleet blast my name into Zakuul.
Exactly what I deserve.
Why leave your name on a single world, when you can carve it across the galaxy?
We're approved for landing. Indo really pulled through with this stolen Zakuul rig--and our disguises. Let's suit up before we make landfall.
We are family.
Kneel before the dragon of Zakuul!
Aaaargh!
Excellent form.
If you want something, spit it out.
Your guests are arriving. They toast your name and hungrily await your speech.
And the rebels?
Adorned with shock collars, as you requested.
The party must be perfect. If you disappoint me...
I'll watch you sizzle.
I can't see a thing in this blasted disguise. How do I look?
Put your SIS training to use, and drop the swagger. We need to act convincing if we're going to reach Vaylin.
Like an Alliance spy.
I guess the ex-Intelligence officer knows best.
Let's find Indo.
Hold still. I'm taking a mental image of you in that armor.
[Flirt] I like what I see.
Don't get used to it. It's already starting to chafe...
I won't be your assassin. If I can remove Vaylin from power without bloodshed, I'll do it.
I may not have to kill her.
After all you've seen, you still cling to empathy. It will be your undoing.
When I take the throne, how long before you call for my destruction?
And then you betray me.
If I wanted you destroyed, I would have done it long ago. My fate is tied to yours.
If I didn't know better, I'd think you were the Knight Captain.
You make a convincing knight.
Let's hope the guests are too busy celebrating to pay us any attention.
I'm not feeling confident.
I know what I'm doing. And I don't swagger.
I'm sure no one will notice.
I'll take that as a compliment.
We're approved for landing. Indo really pulled through with our disguises. Let's suit up before we make landfall.
